sentences.en: A severe infection can be very detrimental to the health of the bird.
sentences.cn: 感染严重时,则会损害鸟的健康.

sentences.en: Building an efficient engine was detrimental to their success.
sentences.cn: 制造高效引擎不利于他们取得成功.

sentences.en: He wouldn't accept that smoking was detrimental to health.
sentences.cn: 他不相信吸烟有害健康.

sentences.en: High molecular weight and large volume are detrimental to solubility.
sentences.cn: 分子量及体积大的分子对其水溶解度不利.

sentences.en: His weakness for cigarettes is detrimental to his health.
sentences.cn: 他抽烟的嗜好对他的身体有害.

sentences.en: In general, an inorganic residue is much more detrimental to the operation of the waveguide.
sentences.cn: 一般, 无机残留物对波导使用的危害要大得多.

sentences.en: Lack of sleep is detrimental to one's health.
sentences.cn: 缺乏睡眠是有害于健康的.

sentences.en: Lime in the soil is detrimental to some plants.
sentences.cn: 土壤里的石灰对某些植物有害.

sentences.en: One tends to develop a feeling that anything of a tensile nature is detrimental in fatigue.
sentences.cn: 人们往往会有这样的感觉;在疲劳中,一切具有拉伸性质的都是不利的.

sentences.en: Resist secret affairs that could be detrimental to your reputation.
sentences.cn: 抵抗住危急你声誉的事件发生.

sentences.en: the detrimental effect of pollution on the environment
sentences.cn: 污染对环境的不利影响

sentences.en: The measures had a detrimental effect.
sentences.cn: 这些措施已产生不良影响.

sentences.en: the sun's detrimental effect on skin
sentences.cn: 日光对皮肤的有害影响

sentences.en: These books are as detrimental as drugs to adolescents.
sentences.cn: 这些书籍简直就是危害青少年的麻醉品.

sentences.en: We know that heat treatment is detrimental to milk.
sentences.cn: 我们知道加热对牛奶是不利的.

sentences.en: While the inclination to procrastinate is common, one must fully consider the detrimental impact of unnecessary delays.
sentences.cn: 虽然拖延的倾向是普遍的, 但是人们应该充分考虑到不必要的延误造成的有害影响.

trans.tran_cn: 有害的人（或物）；不受欢迎的求婚者
